short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LOBSTR extension allows you to use your Stellar wallet in LOBSTR to securely interact with dApps built on Stellar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LOBSTR is a leading platform for managing Stellar Lumens and other assets issued on the Stellar network.

Use LOBSTR extension to securely connect to the best services, exchanges, marketplaces, and apps built on the Stellar network. 

Send any transaction, from simple payments to smart contracts to your LOBSTR mobile app for signature. Review the full transaction details in LOBSTR app on your phone and decide whether to confirm or reject.

LOBSTR extension transmits transactions between the LOBSTR app and third-party services using an encrypted connection. Your private key is stored fully encrypted on your mobile device and is never exposed to the connected service, ensuring maximum security.

View the source code of the LOBSTR extension on GitHub: 
https://github.com/Lobstrco/lobstr-browser-extension/

Check out the integration guide on GitHub to add the “Login with LOBSTR wallet” option to your project:
https://github.com/Lobstrco/lobstr-browser-extension/tree/main/%40lobstrco/signer-extension-api


Don't have the LOBSTR mobile app installed?

• Get it on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lobstr.client
• Download on the App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/lobstr-stellar-lumens-wallet/id1404357892
